abstract: Christopher Clarey On Tennis column notes that Serena Williams and Novak Djokovic are preparing to defend their Wimbledon titles, but under very different circumstances; says that Williams, still reeling from loss at United States Open, has had downbeat year, while Djokovic is on track for Grand Slam.

headline.print_headline: Two Champions, but Two Outlooks, at Wimbledon
headline.main: Two Defending Champions, but Two Outlooks, at Wimbledon

snippet: Serena Williams has not been the same since a loss at the United States Open denied her a Grand Slam. Now Novak Djokovic has a shot to win all four majors in the same calendar year.
lead_paragraph: Serena Williams has not been the same since a loss at the United States Open denied her a Grand Slam. Now Novak Djokovic has a shot to win all four majors in the same calendar year.
